lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.
It's time for the Senior Prom. Are you planning to attend?
Who will you be going with?
You must have met her in your dreams, because you aren't currently WITH a steady girlfriend. You'll have to go to the prom with her in your dreams, too, because now it's too late.
${loverName} looks absolutely stunning in a dazzling formal gown with a plunging neckline.
The events that transpire over the course of the evening include:
You and your date are crowned the King and Queen of the prom!
You meet someone you like better than your date and spend the evening with her.
You get drunk or high (as usual) and pass out, forgetting most of the evening. You are arrested and spend the night in jail. Your date thinks you are a jerk.
You and your date have a great time.
That is, until you try to get romantic with her by suggesting that you spend the night in a hotel. She asks if you want to spend the night in the hospital.
You suggest that the two of you spend the night in a hotel and she agrees. You have a romantic evening. The next morning you go to a quiet diner for breakfast.
You are going steady with someone. Do you mean to say that you are going with someone other than a steady, someone you plan on "having an affair" with?
You cad! You'll never get away with it. As a matter of fact, your steady finds out that you have a date before prom night even arrives and dumps you.

Then I can only assume that you made an unconscious error by choosing this option -- a Freudian slip of the interface, so to speak. I must interpret this as a sign that you never wanted to go to the prom with your steady
girlfriend in the first place, which means your relationship is on the skids.
The excitement of the prom causes stress, which destroys your relationship before prom night even arrives. You fail to find another date and spend the night alone and lonely.
Eventually, you ask this person, and she accepts. Your date looks resplendent in a sexy, white, strapless number.
I'm sorry to break the news to you, but you don't have the social skills necessary to get a date for the prom. You'll have to pass on this one.
